name: Laruaville 8
description:
Welcome to a game where the goal is to turn anything into gold! This process may seem tricky, but luckily, we've enlisted the help of an expert. Well, at least he claims to be one.

The game features a variety of challenges, including Match 3 puzzles, skippable Mahjong, Solitaire levels, Spot the Difference games, and Hidden Object scenes. Additionally, there are two sets of optional bonus levels.

The first set of bonus levels lets you go head-to-head against an AI opponent.

The second set of bonus levels presents a unique challenge – you must avoid collecting Black Coins. If you happen to collect one, the level is considered failed.

And, of course, you get to build an entire town, with the possibility of turning anything into gold by the end. Who knows what awaits you...
